Nightshift nods.

"Oh yeah, big time.  It's one of the greatest relaxation =
techniques ever invented."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

tart from the beginning, then work up ta the big stuff.  First ya learn bal=
ance, and once ya got that mastered, there's no stopp'n ya from kick'n Pred=
acon tail end."
>  
> Seeing that Elita was ready to begin training, Nights=
hift decides to teach her a very calm but balance developing exercise known=
 as Tai Chi, Cybertronian  style.  He smiles down to her and guides her sta=
nce, also taking the same body positions as her own.
>

ise is real easy, and leads up ta more intense training you'll receive late=
r on.  It's known as Tai Chi, Chi be'n your inner energy.   Learn ta harnes=
s your chi and I bet you'll have Waspinator exterminated in no time".
